insert into purchase_income_submit(id, submit_id, code, count, submit_time, status, production_line_id, bill_no) values (#{purchase_submit.id}, #{purchase_submit.submit_id}, #{purchase_submit.code}, #{purchase_submit.count}, now(), 0, #{purchase_submit.production_line_id}, #{purchase_submit.bill_no});
insert into operate(operate_man_id, operate_key_id, operate_time, table_name, field, type, new_value, operate_string) values (#{purchase_submit.submit_id}, #{purchase_submit.id}, now(), 'purchase_income_submit', 'submit_id~code~count~submit_time~status~production_line_id~bill_no', 'insert', '${purchase_submit.submit_id}~${purchase_submit.code}~${purchase_submit.count}~${purchase_submit.submit_time}~0~${purchase_submit.production_line_id}~${purchase_submit.bill_no}', concat('高级用户', #{purchase_submit.submit_id}, '提交采购入库申请'))

update jig_position set status = 3 where seq_id = #{scrap_submit.seq_id} and code = #{scrap_submit.code}; insert into scrap_submit(code, seq_id, submit_time, submit_id, used_count, scrap_reason, scrap_type, scrap_photo_url, status) value (#{scrap_submit.code}, #{scrap_submit.seq_id}, now(), #{scrap_submit.submit_id}, (select used_count from jig_entity where code = #{scrap_submit.code} and seq_id = #{scrap_submit.seq_id}), #{scrap_submit.scrap_reason}, #{scrap_submit.scrap_type}, #{pathName}, 0); insert into message(id, generate_id, generate_time, accept_type, status, message, tab_id) values (UUID(), #{scrap_submit.submit_id}, now(), 'supervisor', '00', '提交了新的报废申请', 'scrap_submit');
insert into operate(operate_man_id, operate_key_id, operate_time, table_name, field, type, new_value, operate_string) values (#{scrap_submit.submit_id}, #{scrap_submit.id}, now(), 'scrap_submit', 'code~seq_id~submit_time~submit_id~scrap_reason~scrap_type~scrap_photo_url~status', 'insert', concat('${scrap_submit.code}~${scrap_submit.seq_id}~', now(), '~${scrap_submit.submit_id}~${scrap_submit.scrap_reason}~${scrap_submit.scrap_type}~${pathName}~0'), concat('高级用户', #{scrap_submit.submit_id}, '提交报废申请'));

update repair_submit set acceptor_id = #{submit_id}, acceptor_time = now(), status = 1 where id = #{id}; insert into repair_submit_history select * from repair_submit where id = #{id}; delete from repair_submit where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select ps.*, production_line.name production_line_name, u1.name submit_name, u2.name first_acceptor_name, u3.name final_acceptor_name from purchase_income_submit ps left join user u1 on ps.submit_id = u1.id left join user u2 on ps.first_acceptor = u2.id left join `user` u3 on ps.final_acceptor = u3.id, production_line where ps.production_line_id = production_line.id limit #{page_number},#{page_size}

select count(*) from purchase_income_submit ps left join user u1 on ps.submit_id = u1.id left join user u2 on ps.first_acceptor = u2.id left join `user` u3 on ps.final_acceptor = u3.id, production_line where ps.production_line_id = production_line.id

select rs.*, u1.name submit_name, u2.name acceptor_name, jig_entity.life_percent from repair_submit rs left join `user` u1 on rs.submit_id = u1.id left join `user` u2 on rs.acceptor_id = u2.id left join jig_entity on rs.code = jig_entity.code and rs.seq_id = jig_entity.seq_id where u1.workcell_id in (select user.workcell_id from user where id = #{id}) and rs.status = 0 limit #{page_number},#{page_size}

select count(*) from repair_submit rs left join `user` u1 on rs.submit_id = u1.id left join `user` u2 on rs.acceptor_id = u2.id where u1.workcell_id in (select user.workcell_id from user where id = #{id}) and rs.status = 0

select ss.*, u1.name submit_name, u2.name first_acceptor_name from scrap_submit ss left join `user` u1 on ss.submit_id = u1.id left join `user` u2 on ss.first_acceptor = u2.id left join `user` u3 on ss.final_acceptor = u3.id where ss.submit_id = #{submit_id} limit #{page_number},#{page_size}

select count(*) from scrap_submit ss left join `user` u1 on ss.submit_id = u1.id left join `user` u2 on ss.first_acceptor = u2.id left join `user` u3 on ss.final_acceptor = u3.id where ss.submit_id = #{submit_id}
select count(*) from repair_submit inner join user on submit_id = user.id where workcell_id = (select workcell_id from user where id = #{submit_id})
select code as name, count(0) as `value` from repair_submit inner join user on submit_id = user.id where workcell_id = (select workcell_id from user where id = #{submit_id}) group by code
